title: Implement patient creation form
summary: As a user, I can create a new patient profile with basic demographics.
description:
Create a comprehensive patient registration form that captures essential demographic information. The form should be user-friendly, validate input data, and integrate with the patient database.

## Technical Details
- Form should use React Hook Form for state management
- Validation using Zod schemas
- Success notification on submission
- Redirect to patient list after successful creation

## UI Requirements
- Clean, accessible form design
- Clear field labels and placeholders
- Inline validation feedback
- Loading states during submission
acceptanceCriteria: User can fill first name, last name, DOB, gender
On success, patient appears in patients list
